file.title: Screen shot

p.text: This command photographing everything that is located on a computer screen and saves it in clipboard (the place where it is stored, that you copy and paste).

p.textAll: Figure is also stored in a temporary file, which you can assign a picture object (such as Background window).

sample.sampletitle: Options change the background image in the main window
sample.samplecode: Window1.Window1.Fonovoy pattern = "C:/1.bmp" Window1.Window1.Fonovoy pattern = "/ 1.bmp" Window1.Window1.Fonovoy picture = My Documents&"/ 2.jpg" Window1.Window1.Fonovoy image = Window1.Knopka1.Fonovoy picture

file.seealso:
background style
Auxiliary words , such as basic Folders
Other object
